The amount of Zeal you spend for this Zenith determines additional damage for your attack, which is not doubled on a critical hit: @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.macros.xumjguwPtOtkC7tL]{Use Zenith}

  • 1 Zeal: @Damage[4d8[spirit]] damage

  • 2-3 Zeal: @Damage[6d8[spirit]]spirit damage

  • 4-5 Zeal: @Damage[8d8[spirit]]spirit damage

If you have a multi-attack penalty already, this Zenith gains the Press trait and has the following failure effect:

Failure After your attack, you regain all the Zeal you spent for it.

Special If your last action was a Flourish action from the Dervish class, you can ignore the Flourish trait for this action and you can perform Shatterdrive with 1 less action.
